Class StudentNotificationPane

java.lang.Object
ticktocktrack.gui.StudentNotificationPane
public class StudentNotificationPane extends Object
Represents the notification panel in the student dashboard. Manages loading, displaying, and interacting with student notifications.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private boolean
    allNotificationsLoaded
    Flag to indicate whether all notifications have been loaded.
    private StudentDashboardPage
    dashboardPage
    Reference to the parent student dashboard page.
    private int
    loadedNotificationCount
    Count of how many notifications have been loaded so far.
    private javafx.scene.layout.VBox
    notificationHolder
    Container VBox that holds the notification items in the popup.
    private javafx.scene.image.ImageView
    notificationIcon
    ImageView representing the notification icon.
    private javafx.scene.layout.StackPane
    notificationIconWrapper
    Wrapper around the notification icon, useful for styling and event handling.
    private javafx.stage.Popup
    notificationPopup
    Popup window for displaying notifications.
    private javafx.collections.ObservableList<Notification>
    notifications
    Observable list holding the loaded notifications.
    private final int
    PAGE_SIZE
    Number of notifications to load each time (pagination size).
    private int
    userId
    The user ID of the current student.

      private final int PAGE_SIZE
      Number of notifications to load each time (pagination size).
      See Also:

      Count of how many notifications have been loaded so far.

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentNotificationPane

      public StudentNotificationPane(StudentDashboardPage dashboardPage)
      Constructs a new StudentNotificationPane linked to the specified dashboard page.
      Parameters:
      dashboardPage - the StudentDashboardPage that this notification pane belongs to

  • Method Details

    • loadNotificationsFromDatabase

      private void loadNotificationsFromDatabase()
      Loads a batch of notifications from the database for the current user. Uses pagination to load notifications in chunks defined by PAGE_SIZE. If all notifications have already been loaded, this method returns immediately.

    • addNotification

      public void addNotification(String message, LocalDateTime dateSent, String status, int senderUserId)
      Adds a new notification with the given message, date sent, status, and sender user ID.
      Parameters:
      message - The notification message content.
      dateSent - The date and time the notification was sent.
      status - The status of the notification (e.g., "read", "unread").
      senderUserId - The user ID of the sender who generated this notification.

    • addNotificationToHolder

      private void addNotificationToHolder(Notification notification)
      Adds a single notification item to the notification holder UI container. Creates the visual representation of the notification and appends it to the notification list.
      Parameters:
      notification - The Notification object to be displayed.

    • getDefaultIcon

      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView getDefaultIcon()
      Returns the default user icon as an ImageView with preset size. This icon is used when no specific user icon is available for a notification.
      Returns:
      ImageView containing the default user icon image.

    • addHoverEffect

      private void addHoverEffect(javafx.scene.layout.HBox notificationBox, int notificationId)
      Adds a hover effect to the given notification box. The effect typically involves changing styles or visuals on mouse enter and exit.
      Parameters:
      notificationBox - The HBox representing the notification UI element.
      notificationId - The unique identifier for the notification.

    • getNotificationIconWrapper

      public javafx.scene.layout.StackPane getNotificationIconWrapper()
      Gets the wrapper StackPane containing the notification icon. This wrapper may be used for positioning or styling purposes.
      Returns:
      The StackPane that wraps the notification icon.

    • getNotificationIcon

      public javafx.scene.image.ImageView getNotificationIcon()
      Gets the ImageView representing the notification icon. This icon is typically displayed in the dashboard UI.
      Returns:
      The ImageView of the notification icon.

    • showPopup

      public void showPopup(double x, double y)
      Shows the notification popup at the specified screen coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate where the popup should appear.
      y - The y-coordinate where the popup should appear.

    • hidePopup

      public void hidePopup()
      Hides the notification popup if it is currently visible.

    • isPopupShowing

      public boolean isPopupShowing()
      Checks whether the notification popup is currently visible on the screen.
      Returns:
      true if the popup is showing, false otherwise.
